record.text: We paid for our reservation when we made it using WhereToSleep.com, but then we gave a different credit card when we got to the Easy Street Lodge and checked in. We finally realized that we got charged twice for the stay! Both credit card accounts had the same charge - on one from WhereToSleep.com on then on the other one by the hotel from when we checked out. We can't get our money back from either. The hotel says they didn't get payment from the online site, and we can't resolve this with WhereToSleep.com with multiple telephone calls to their customer service. Maybe you can??
